game.name: The Sphinx of Time
game.desc: Time slowed down -- a little at first, and no one noticed. Then the leaves began to stall in the sky. Join the crew of The Bahamut on a desperate voyage to the end of the universe to restart time itself in this sci-fi, time-warping mystery adventure featuring 30â€“60 minutes of fiendish puzzles, exploration, and point-and-click storytelling.
